raw: By Lewis Krauskopf NEW YORK , March 31 ( Reuters ) - U.S. pension funds that delayed rebalancing their portfolios are likely to pump about $ 400 billion into stocks over the next two quarters , analysts at JP Morgan said , providing a potential boost to equity markets battered by the coronavirus pandemic .
